explanation: [0-0] In a room, a woman stands in the center. She wears a black and white striped dress with light green dyed hair ends. She looks down at her hands, one hand reaching towards the camera and the other hand raised. The room has white walls and tiled floors. There is a door on the left side of the room and a white cabinet on the right side. There are also black English subtitles at the top.

[0-3] The woman claps her hands in the same posture, looks up to the left front and spreads out her arms. The scene switches to a woman in a blue suit with orange hair and fairy wings on her back. She stands in a room with a chandelier above her head. She slides her hand down, and white English words appear in the upper left corner. The woman leans slightly forward and looks at the camera with her hands spread out.
